chapters.title: Prologue: Deceptive Appearances
chapters.info: Eadwin, p. 42 (33)—Man who Verin Mathwin would have married had she not gone to Tar Valon. He was from her home town of Far Madding, but is presumably dead at this point—Verin is old by Aes Sedai standards, and very old by non-Aes Sedai standards. See also Mathwin, Verin.
